text: Twilight of a Woman's Soul () is a 1913 Russian silent drama movie directed by Yevgeni Bauer.Хорошо выдержанное киноВ Музее модерна покажут фильм Бауэра «Сумерки женской души» It stars Nina Chernova, A. Ugryumov, and V. Demert. == Actors == * Nina Chernova as Vera Dubovskaya * A. Ugryumov as Prince Dolsky * V. Demert as Maksim Petrov * V. Bryansky as Vitaly Bryansky == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:Russian silent movies Category:1913 movies Category:Movies directed by Yevgeni Bauer
title: Twilight of a Woman's Soul
